description: Styles for the Tic Tac Toe interactive game frontend, including theme management with CSS variables, layout, and responsive design.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Main container class that centers the content and handles the overall layout of the application.

classes.name: game-container
classes.description: Class that styles the main game container with padding, background, and border properties.

classes.name: status
classes.description: Class used for displaying the game status message with specific font properties.

classes.name: game-board
classes.description: Class that styles the grid layout for the game board.

classes.name: square
classes.description: Class that styles each square in the game board with background, border, and hover effects.

classes.name: controls
classes.description: Class that styles the control buttons layout.

classes.name: control-button
classes.description: Class that styles individual control buttons.

classes.name: scoreboard
classes.description: Class that styles the scoreboard area, displaying scores.

classes.name: scores
classes.description: Class that styles the scores layout.

classes.name: score-item
classes.description: Class used for individual score items in the scoreboard.

classes.name: player
classes.description: Class that styles the player name display.

classes.name: score
classes.description: Class that styles the displayed score for a player.
